Introduction

  • Item Name : AutoGML Tables
  • Item Version : v 1.0 BETA
  • Developers : Harshid Koladara, Helisha Patel

First of all, Thank you so much for using our product. You are awesome!

This documentation is to help you regarding each step of train your custom Tables model. Please go through the documentation carefully to understand how this will work properly. You may train your model by here.

Getting Started

It is a index page for AutoGML Tables. With this you can create new project or navigate through the existing projects. You may get there by here.

Create a project

You can create project from hear. The name of project must be atleast 5 character long. You may create your model by here.

Import Dataset

You can import images from hear. It only accepts CSV or TSV file formats, So other formats can generate errors.

You can import dataset from GitHub or local system. If you upload a multiple dataset files all column names and order must be same otherwise it will generate error or reduce the accuracy.

Import from GitHub

It is possible to upload a CSV file is from your GitHub repository. Click on the dataset in your repository, then click on View Raw. Copy the link to the raw dataset and paste in input feild.

Import from local system

You can upload datast from local system. Choose file and the click on Import button.

Visualize Datasets

After successfully uploaded dataset you will be reddirected on visualize page.

List Dataset files

Hear all dataset files you uploaded are listed. If you want to add new dataset files you can add by clicking on Add Dataset button.

If want to delete any dataset file you can delete by clicking on Delete button and can visualize by clicking on Show button.

Dataset

You can visualize dataset file hear.

Define Schema

On right side, the table shows every columns and its data-type in your dataset. If data-type is detected incorrectly the you can correct it by choosing from drop-down menu. If columns value are not useful in dataset, then mark it as Nullable, so it will be not considered in training.

If task is a suprevised learning, then select target column from Select Target drop-down menu, otherwise it will be considered as unsupervised task.

After every change click on Verify button to make changes.

Analyze Dataset

Hear you can analyze your uploaded data.

It shows the all Column names, it's Datatype, Nullablility, Missing values, Distinct values, Mean, Standerard Deviation and Correlation with target.

It will show NA in case of datatype other then Integer and Float.

Train your Model

From hear you can train your model. It shows the Model name, Input Instances, Input features and Target.

Download & Predict

From hear, you can download your model or predict on the model.

On left side of the page, you can also see training and testing accuracy.

Download Model

You can download your custom trained model by clicking on the Download Model button.

Predict on single entity

To detect class of image follow the below steps:

  • Fill the values in the feilds
  • Click on Predict button

    • Batch Prediction

    For batch prediction upload csv dataset without the target column and then click on Predict button.
